comment: Spanish has never been easy for me but Professor Hance makes it easy to understand as well as makes it enjoyable. She is amazing, sweet, extremely EXTREMELY funny and has the best personality. You'll enjoy this class just for her alone but also for her teaching skills. Would completely take again
This woman is hilarious and makes class really fun. Laid back environment, but still important to get the work done. Definitely recommend!!!!!
Great, funny, teacher who is very supportive and passionate about what she does. Classes are not boring, and you do use the book! GET HER :) Easy A.
If you have the chance to take KSU 1101 from this woman then DO. She is awesome and the class is fairly easy.
Cool lady and makes class interesting.
Mrs. Hance is awesome! She has a great attitude and loves teaching. You will look forward to attending this class.

She was the best teacher! I had so much fun in her class. She makes it easy to stay awake and alert. It is a good first early morning class. I always left class in a good mood. It is easy to make a good grade unless you're just completely lazy.

I usually don't take the time to rate professors, but Hance was awesome! I suck at spanish but made an A. Hance is quirky, & a little scary at first, but she's very easy to understand and willing to help. Wish she was teaching 2002.  I would not have passed if werent for her..she does anything & everything to help her students.the best prof at KSU

I usually don't take the time to rate professors, but Hance was awesome! I suck at spanish but made an A. Hance is quirky, & a little scary at first, but she's very easy to understand and willing to help. Wish she was teaching 2001.  I would not have passed if werent for her..she does anything & everything to help her students.the best prof at KSU

She is really awesome and soooo funny! She only teaches morning classes and 8am was tough, but she made it really worth it. I'd wake up that early again just to take her. She grades fair, atten. is mandatory, and it's an easy class if you just come and do the assignments! Oral exam is also easy and not hard or stressful! Love her!

FABULOUS!! Im a terrible spanish student who shouldve been taking a lower level class but I made an A thanks to Hance. She is entertaining, helpful, & encouraging. She really knows her stuff & made me enjoy Spanish. TAKE HER!!
Prof. Hance is a really great teacher. I had her for an 8am 1102. Yeah really early but she made it worth it. She grades easy and fair. Just do your work and you will make an easy A.
Best spanish teacher EVER!!!! Very funny and the class has a relaxed atmosphere. Pay attention and review and will pass the class easily.

This class is across the board AWESOME. Prof Hance is an incredible teacher. She is hilarious! Class contains lessons, discussions, 3 compositions, 1 group project, and nightly homework. 2 tests and a final and her tests are simple. She grades moderately. If you are interested in Spanish, you have to take Hance!

I am currently in Hance's class and love it! She is a wonderful teacher, if not the best Spanish teacher Kennesaw currently has. I have been complemented several times by native speakers for my Spanish speaking ability. Need the book, attendace isn't mandatory but I enjoy going! Take her if you have the chance
WONDERFUL teacher! Very helpful and funny. Had her at 9:30 in the morning and she definitely helped me to wake up! Great spanish teacher and wonderful person all around.

Senora Hance=awesome. She's understanding and offers TONS of chances for help. Had her 8am during the summer and think I would have died with any other professor. Just do your homework, study, and pay attention!! She's a teacher who's really there for her students and one who obviously loves what she does. She rocks.

AMAZING TEACHER! I took her during the summer at 8am. I thought this would be a horrible class for that time...but Professor Hance makes the class come alive. :) I highly recommend her if you are interested in Spanish and actually want to learn it and have fun at the same time. Easy A if you do all homework, go to class, and study study study.

PHENOMENAL WOMAN. I considered not taking her class this summer but, I'm sooo very happy that I stayed. She is just ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL; there is no other word to describe how great of a teacher she is. I love the language because she has inspired me a lot to learn it. I'm usually the first one out the door when class is overbut not for this class

Prof. Hance is a really good professor. I was not too good at Spanish, but she is very helpful and very funny. Keep in mind, if you are going to be late to the class, bring her chocolate. There is not much homework and the tests are pretty easy. I would take her again for sure.
I don't like Spanish, but Prof. Hance is an AWESOME teacher! She's a funny spaz, but she knows what she's talking about and she's good at explaining it. I give her a thumbs up all across the board.
Awesome! Fun! Goofy! She was an amazing first year spanish teacher! Bring her chocolate!!! Me encanta esta profesora!

Think Ellen Degeneres... she's fun and energetic. Class is never a bore and it's challenging because all of the vocabulary words, but Hance makes it fun. As long as you do your part, you'll love this class.
HANCE is the best Spanish teacher ever! Take her class because it is so worth it. She will make you die laughing while also learning the language in a fun way!

Hance is AMAZING. I never thought I'd find myself liking and even looking forward to Spanish. She's hilarious, knows how to keep the class entertained, and is the best Spanish teacher/professor I've ever had. I'm making my schedule next semester around taking her again. TAKE HER. You'll find yourself learning and having a good time.

Hance is like the only spanish teacher i have ever actually enjoyed! She is hilarious, and her personality rocks!! i strongly reccommend her!!! try not to miss to many classes. she is very outgoing and nice!! She is a very leniant grader too! her tests are easy if you study!

FUNNY!! Great class. keeps you intreasted, exactly what is needed for a span class! I took medical spanish. She went pretty fast over the basics cuz it wuz jus medical class. decent amount of memorization. she loves skits. I would deff. take her class again.
I love Profesora Hance, she is the BEST Spanish Professor I have EVER had!!! She cares, she lovs what she is doing. TAKE HER CLASS!!!
I love Mrs. Hance! She is hilarious. I was entertained & happened to be learning at the same time! She is a reasonable, understanding & caring teacher. TAKE HER =)

Hance is amazing! I am taking 2001 with a different professor (Hance wasn't available) and when I started having problems she was so willing to help me and worked around my work schedule and made it a lot easier.I wish I could take her for all of my spanish classes. Her class is fun and you learn a lot. Take her if she can, you will LOVE the class!

Mrs Hance is a great teacher! I would definitely recommend her to anyone looking to take a spanish course. She is fun and easy-going, and I learned a lot from her class. If you attend class regularly and study a little for the tests, you'll have an easy A.
The best Spanish teacher I have had. I wish she was teaching the 2001 course because I throughly enjoyed her class. If you want to laugh and learn, sign up for her class.

Damn sexy! No but really, awesome professor, easy grading, and very leniant towards busy schedules. She actually cares about what goes on in your life outside of school and understands that school will not pay the bills just yet. Group project at the end, good fun! And take good notes in her class and DO THE HOMEWORK, it will get you an A in class!
She is an AWESOME TEACHER!! if you go to class and participate she is amazing. i loved her class and made sure she was my professor in every spanish class!!

Fab teacher, serious and fun at the same time.  Enjoyed the class very much, hope to enroll for her next level spanish class.  She is very helpful and grades fairly.  What is expected of the student is very clear.  Great beginner class.
Teacher very clear on pun and what to expect. She is understanding, but punctual

Professor Hance is a wonderful teacher! I highly suggest taking this class! She speaks very clearly and makes class so much fun. This is my favorite class by far. Her tests are fairly easy and clear. She is also hilarious and you will find yourself looking forward to class just because of the funny stories she tells!

One of the best teachers I've ever had! She made class so much fun. I began to look forward to it everyday. She was very clear and very helpful. Her tests were very fair and you knew what to expect on them. I highly recommend her.
